mapper.insert: insert into sample_bar (id, bcode, title, is_deleted, cruser, crtime, mduser, mdtime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{cruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sample_bar set bcode = #{bcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, cruser = #{cruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crtime = #{crtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mduser = #{mduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mdtime = #{mdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, bcode, title, is_deleted, cruser, crtime, mduser, mdtime from sample_bar
